subject: ANTI-TERRORIST MONETARY,CYBER
body:
ANTI-TERRORIST MONETARY,CYBER RESPONSE AND CRIMES DIVISION FBI
HEADQUARTERS WASHINGTON DC FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATIONS J.EDGAR HOOVER BUILDING935 PENNSYLVANIA AVENUE, NW WASHINGTON, D.C. 20535-0001
Our Ref:  CBN /0N3/CONTRACT NO./CAC-95826
To.  (Beneficiary)
I am Special Agent Kelvin Markson, an FBI Agent that has been delegated to investigate these fraud stars who are in the business of swindling Foreigners that came for transactions in Nigeria and all over the world. Please be informed that during my investigation I found out that there is a huge sum of $6.5 million that has been assigned in your name (Beneficiary.) and these fraud stars are busy swindling you without any hope of receiving your funds.
We need to inform you that it has come to our notice and we have thoroughly Investigated with the help of our Intelligence Monitoring Network System and the (Interpol) that you are having an illegal Transaction with Impostors Claiming to be the Bank Governor in African, the CEO of Banks, General Manager Banks, FNB, Loto Officials, FIFA President,Chief Security Officer, Chief Financial Officer, Chief Communications Officer, Chief Operations Officer, Chief IT & T Officer, Chief Marketing and Commercial Officer.
We have to inform you that we have made an arrest in respect of this delayed overdue fund. I have a very limited time to stay in Nigeria so I advise you to respond to this mail immediately.
I shall expect your response as soon as you receive this email. Please Note that I have attached my Identification to this email. do not inform any of the people that collected money from you before now about this new development, Till we finish our assignment. Note that the above funds have been cleared from terrorist or fraud related activities.
I await your Response to email address:   
kelvinmarksonagent1@firemail.at
Best Regard,
Agent  Kelvin Markson
FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION VISIT IN NIGERIA
INVESTIGATION ON ALL ON-LINE WIRE TRANSFER

subject: Re: ANTI-TERRORIST MONETARY,CYBER
body:
Hello Agent Kelvin Markson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your efforts in investigating these fraud stars who have been swindling foreigners in Nigeria and around the world. It's concerning to hear that there is a huge sum of money assigned in my name and that these impostors are trying to deceive me.

I'm glad to know that the FBI, along with the Monitoring Network System and Interpol, are working together to address this issue. Can you please provide more details about the specific fraudulent activities that have been taking place? How did you come across this information?

Also, I would like to know what steps are being taken to apprehend these fraud stars and ensure that they face legal consequences for their actions. Is there any progress in the investigation so far?

Lastly, I want to assure you that I will not inform anyone who may have collected money from me before about this new development until you finish your investigation. I understand the importance of keeping this confidential.

Thank you once again for bringing this matter to my attention. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mike

subject: REF: ANTI-TERRORIST MONETARY,CYBER
body:
­Attn:Mike, 

Your message is acknowledged. 
We are sorry for the late response because it was due to our tight daily schedules. 

However,all explanations you made are well understood but we cannot make any progress without proper information from victims. 

Firstly,you are advised to forward your cell phone number to enable us to have a conversation with you to enable us to get some clarification and also to enable us to confirm from you the method you prefer towards your approved payment.
Regards 

Kelvin Markson 
Gesendet mit Firemail.de - Freemail

subject: Re: REF: ANTI-TERRORIST MONETARY,CYBER
body:
Hello Kelvin,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I understand that you need proper information from the victims in order to make progress. However, I'm curious about why you specifically need my cell phone number. Can you please explain how it will help with the approved payment? Additionally, could you provide more details about the method of payment?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Mike

subject: REF: ANTI-TERRORIST MONETARY,CYBER
body:
­Attn:Mike, 
I write to acknowledge the receipt of your email,I want you to send your information to enable us to send it to the bank so that they will commence processing of the funds. 

Be reminded that the Affidavit of Claim we found in your file with the Central Bank of Nigeria when we came down will be sent to you for your proper view ,so from the document and records,this fund ought to have been transferred to you since 2011 but,Nigeria Presidency are busy trading with the funds for their political activities,the good news now is that we are totally under the control of the fund. 

I would like to ask and know if you will be able to come down here in Nigeria and meet us one on one and that will also enable you to monitor the fund transfer?,if that is possible for you,please kindly let me know because we have about 12 Americans down here who came down to witness the transfer of their own fund and there are other foreigners who are here too,it is left for you to decide. 

There are two options we have chosen and agreed with the Governor Central Bank of Nigeria for this payment.First,is bank to bank transfer which we have seen and observed that it is very costly to be handled due to charges but if you feel you can handle that,there will be no problem then,the other option is the use of ATM MASTER CARD which is very cheap to operate and Majority have chosen that,the ATM CARD is a daily withdrawals of US$15,000 everyday and the Card will run for good four(4) years.Why I have made out time in explaining these things for you is for you to know what to do and make the best choice because,we don't want to leave a cent for Nigeria Government for they all corrupt. 

I would like to have your email back as soon as you get this email.
Regards 

Kelvin Markson 
Gesendet mit Firemail.de - Freemail

subject: Re: REF: ANTI-TERRORIST MONETARY,CYBER
body:
Hello Mike,

I hope this email finds you well. I received your message regarding the funds that are currently being processed by the bank. It's interesting to hear about the Affidavit of Claim that was found in my file with the Central Bank of Nigeria. I would definitely like to take a look at it and understand more about the situation.

As for coming down to Nigeria, it's something I would need to consider. Can you provide me with more details about why it would be necessary for me to be there in person? Also, if there are other foreigners who have already come down to witness the transfer, I would be interested to know their experiences.

Regarding the two options for transferring the funds, could you please explain in more detail how each option works? I want to make sure I understand all the implications and costs involved before making a decision.

Thank you for taking the time to explain these things to me. I appreciate your assistance in helping me make an informed choice. Please let me know when I can expect to receive the Affidavit of Claim and any further instructions.

Best wishes,
Mike

subject: REF: ANTI-TERRORIST MONETARY,CYBER
body:
Attn:Mike, 
Remember once again  that we have concluded all investigations concerning those two options listed below as agreed with the federal government's representatives during our discussion. 
First option is Kable Telegraphic Transfer popularly known as KTT which many foreign beneficiaries complained that they spent huge amounts of money for procurement of  documents but all efforts proved abortive. 
Second option is an Automated Teller Machine known as ATM CARD interswitch machine withdrawal which we agreed will be easier . 
However,we still ask each foreign beneficiary to make a choice of any of those options,as we cannot mandate or force any beneficiary to choose a particular option. 
As you are informed already that our team has finalized with relevant authorities that all foreign beneficiaries will not pay upfront transfer charges as long as the beneficiary obtains a deduction form which will enable them to secure a deduction certificate. 
Since you have never concluded to come down here to obtain the  deduction form by yourself,you are advised to contact an attorney who will assist you to carry on such an assignment while our duty is to guide and monitor all activities to make sure you get your funds without hindrance. 
The attorney information is as follows below,he is an accredited and reputable  international recognized lawyer. 

Name: Barrister.George Yemi 
(For:A.Y. GEROGE   & ASSOCIATES) 
Email:  gerogeyemichambers@firemail.de 
You should go and contact him to enable him to assist you while you will negotiate with him on how you will pay him legal charge as soon as you receive your fund. 

Please endeavor to update us on every development because our primary responsibility is to make sure every foreign citizen receives his/her fund without further hindrance or paying unnecessary upfront transfer charges. 
Please Note: all documents will be forwarded to you by the attorney as legal practitioner okay.
Regards 

Kelvin Markson 
Gesendet mit Firemail.de - Freemail

subject: Re: REF: ANTI-TERRORIST MONETARY,CYBER
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to hear about the options available for transferring funds. Can you tell me more about how the Automated Teller Machine (ATM) card machine withdrawal works? How secure is it compared to other methods?

Best wishes,
Mike

subject: Re: REF: ANTI-TERRORIST MONETARY,CYBER
body:
Hello Kelvin Markson,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that foreign citizens receive their funds without any hindrance or upfront transfer charges. It's good to know that there are options available, such as the Kable Transfer (KTT) and the Automated Teller Machine (ATM) Card machine withdrawal.

I understand that I need to obtain a deduction form in order to secure the deduction and proceed with the transfer. You mentioned that I should contact an attorney from GEROGE ASSOCIATES who can assist me with this process. Could you please provide me with more details about this attorney? What is their name and contact information? Also, if I choose to work with them, how will the legal charges be determined?

I look forward to your response and appreciate your guidance throughout this process.

Best wishes,
Mike

subject: REF: ANTI-TERRORIST MONETARY,CYBER
body:
Attn:Mike, 
The receipt of your message acknowledged. 
What information about the attorney are you referring to? Because the below information is their email contact ,so whatever more information you need from them will be given to you by them. 
For more clarifications you should contact the attorney because we as investigative agencies have done our duty and handed over all agreed processes leading to the claiming of the payment to the assigned ministries. 
Be informed that the attorney will do all the needful towards the immediate remittance of your approved funds. 

Name: Barrister.George Yemi 
(For:A.Y. GEROGE   & ASSOCIATES) 
Email:  gerogeyemichambers@firemail.de
Regards 

Kelvin Markson 
Gesendet mit Firemail.de - Freemail

subject: Re: REF: ANTI-TERRORIST MONETARY,CYBER
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Could you provide more details about the attorney and the approved funds? I would like to understand the process better.

Best wishes,
Mike
